1: The implementation of stricter environmental regulations has prompted companies to adopt more sustainable practices, though some argue it may hinder economic growth.
(1) Stricter environmental regulations are beneficial for economic growth.
(2) Companies are adopting sustainable practices due to new regulations, but some believe this could slow down the economy.
(3) Environmental regulations have no impact on corporate practices or the economy.
(4) Economic growth is the only concern when implementing environmental regulations.
des_1: الخيار (2) هو الأنسب، لأنه يوضح كيف تشمل القوائم الجديدة للشركات التي تهدف إلى العمل مع التخصصات الاقتصادية.
2: The discovery of ancient artifacts has provided invaluable insights into the cultural practices of early civilizations, while also sparking debates among historians about their significance.
(1) Ancient artifacts have little to offer regarding early civilizations.
(2) The finding of artifacts has helped historians understand early cultures, but it has also raised questions about their importance.
(3) Historians unanimously agree on the significance of ancient artifacts.
(4) The discovery of artifacts has no impact on our understanding of early civilizations.
des_2: الخيار (2) هو الأنسب، لأنه يعكس الفائدة والاكتشافات مع ذكر النقاشات التاريخية.
3: Advancements in biotechnology are revolutionizing healthcare by providing innovative treatments, but they also raise ethical dilemmas regarding genetic manipulation.
(1) Biotechnology advancements have no effect on healthcare practices.
(2) While biotechnology is improving healthcare with new treatments, it also presents ethical challenges related to genetics.
(3) Innovative treatments are available without any ethical considerations in biotechnology.
(4)  Healthcare has not changed with the advent of biotechnology.
des_3: الخيار (2) هو الأنسب، لأنه يوضح كيفية التعامل مع التكنولوجيا الخاصة بالرعاية الصحية المتعلقة بالأمور الحيوانية.
4: The digital age has transformed communication, allowing for instantaneous interactions, yet it raises concerns about the depth of relationships in an increasingly virtual world.
(1) Instant communication in the digital age has no effect on personal relationships.
(2) Although communication is faster now, it may undermine the quality of relationships.
(3) The digital age has improved the depth of personal interactions.
(4) Virtual communication has eliminated all concerns about personal relationships.
des_4: الخيار (2) هو المناسب، وبالتالي يعكس التواصل مع التركيز على عمق العلاقات.
